projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: Making my own website had been something that I was putting off for quite a long time mainly because I do not enjoy the tedious process of web design. I used Figma to plan out how my website should look before I started coding. I chose TypeScript and Next.js v13 mainly because they are trendy and I wanted to get better at using them. For design, I took inspiration from other developers' websites and tried to follow material design guidelines. I used few external libraries to add some components and animations.  I kept all website data static in the filesystem because it is easier to scale and modify later on. For deployment, I used vercel because it intergrates very smoothly with Next.js applications.
